Cox Media Group radio stations 'Last Songs Played'.

A short contract project, I worked with Clickmore to design a page for Cox Media Groupâ€™s 70+ radio station websites. The focus was on their most visited section of the websites, the last songs played, where radio listeners visit to get information of music they have heard. I approached the project with the wireframes and header previously completed, and began with laying out the remainder of the body. This design would later be implemented across the homepage and other sections the sites. Emphasis was taken on the browse by time mechanism, providing the user the ability to drag the timing bar up to 48 hours in the past.An example of this design can be seen here.
